sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Public Conveyance Notice Act.

sections.heading: A notice shall be prominently displayed in each vehicle or
sections.text:
conveyance used for the transportation of the public for hire which must
state substantially the following: Any person who assaults or harms an
individual whom he knows to be a driver, operator, employee or passenger of
a transportation facility or system engaged in the business of
transportation for hire and who is then performing in such capacity or
using such public transportation as a passenger, if such individual is
assaulted, commits a Class A misdemeanor, or if such individual is harmed,
commits a Class 3 felony.
